title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 941/88 of 8 April 1988 on the supply of refined rape seed oil to Bangladesh as food aid
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 941/88  of 8 April 1988  on the supply of refined rape seed oil to Bangladesh as food aid
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A tendering procedure is hereby initiated for the award of a contract for the supply of refined rape seed oil to Bangladesh in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EEC) No 2200/87 and with the conditions laid down in the Annex  hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
